entry.title: 集合元素个数与线性空间的维数
entry.content:
证明一个集合元素个数不超过线性空间的维数, 可以去证明这个集合的元素是线性无关的. 而证明线性空间的维数不超过集合元素个数n, 可以考虑证明线性空间中任意n+1个元素都线性相关. 这在域论中是常见的手法.

下面给出几个例子.

问题 1 设\(V\)为 n 维实线性空间, \(M\subseteq\mathrm{End}V\), 满足

  1. \(\mathrm{id}\in M,0 otin M\);

  2. 若\(\mathscr{A},\mathscr{B}\in M\), 则\(\mathscr{AB}\in M\)或\(\mathscr{BA}\in M\);

  3. 若\(\mathscr{A},\mathscr{B}\in M\), 则\(\mathscr{AB}=\mathscr{BA}\)或\(\mathscr{AB}=-\mathscr{BA}\);

  4. 若\(\mathscr{A}\in M\)且\(\mathscr{A} eq\pm\mathrm{id}\), 则存在\(\mathscr{B}\in M\), s.t. \(\mathscr{AB=-BA}\)

证明: \(M\)中的元素个数不超过\(2n^{2}\).

证明: (提示: 证明一个集合元素个数不超过线性空间的维数, 可以去证明这个集合的元素是线性无关的. 此处\(n^{2}\)暗示维数, \(\mathscr{A},-\mathscr{A}\)可以同时出现, 所以有个 2 倍.)

首先证明\( orall\mathscr{A}\in M\), 都有\(\mathscr{A}^{2}=\pm\mathrm{id}\).

任取\(\mathscr{A}\in M\) , 由(2)得\(\mathscr{A}^{2}\in M\). 如果\(\mathscr{A}^{2} eq\pm\mathrm{id}\) , 则由(4), \(\exists\mathscr{B}\in M\), s.t. \(\mathscr{A}^{2}\mathscr{B}=-\mathscr{BA}^{2}\).

另一方面, 若\(\mathscr{AB}=\mathscr{BA}\), 则\(\mathscr{A}^{2}\mathscr{B}=\mathscr{A}(\mathscr{AB})=\mathscr{A}(\mathscr{BA})=(\mathscr{AB})\mathscr{A}=\mathscr{B}\mathscr{A}^{2}\); 若\(\mathscr{AB}=-\mathscr{BA}\), 则\(\mathscr{A}^{2}\mathscr{B}=\mathscr{A}(\mathscr{AB})=\mathscr{A}(-\mathscr{BA})=-(\mathscr{AB})\mathscr{A}=\mathscr{B}\mathscr{A}^{2}\). 即总有\(\mathscr{A}^{2}\mathscr{B}=\mathscr{B}\mathscr{A}^{2}\). 所以\(M i\mathscr{A}^{2}\mathscr{B}=0\), 这与(1)矛盾.

然后证明\(M\)中不同且不互为相反数的元素线性无关.

(反证法)假设\(M\)中不同且不互为相反数的元素线性相关, 那么一定可以找到一个最小的\(n\), 使得\(M\)中不同且不互为相反数的\(n\)个元素线性相关.

设\(\mathscr{A}_{1}, \mathscr{A}_{2}, \cdots, \mathscr{A}_{n}\in M\)互不相同且\( orall i eq j\), \(\mathscr{A}_{i}+\mathscr{A}_{j} eq0\), \(\mathscr{A}_{1}, \mathscr{A}_{2}, \cdots, \mathscr{A}_{n}\)线性相关.

$ k_{i} $ , 使得 \(\sum_{i=1}^{n} k_{i} \mathscr{A}_{i}=0\). 不妨设\(\mathscr{A}_{1}=\pm\mathrm{id}\) (否则考虑\(\sum_{i=1}^{n} k_{i} \mathscr{A}_{1} \mathscr{A}_{i}=0\)) , 则$ {2}, , {n}$.

\(\mathscr{A}_{n} eq\pm\mathrm{id}\)和(4)可知\(\mathscr{C}\in M\), s.t. \(\mathscr{A}_{n}\mathscr{C}=-\mathscr{C}\mathscr{A}_{n}\).

不妨假设对\(1\leq i\leq t\), \(\mathscr{A}_{i}\mathscr{C}=\mathscr{C}\mathscr{A}_{i}\); 对\(t+1\leq i\leq n-1\), \(\mathscr{A}_{i}\mathscr{C}=-\mathscr{C}\mathscr{A}_{i}\). 对式子

\[\sum_{i=1}^{n-1}k_{i}\mathscr{A}_{i}=-k_{n}\mathscr{A}_{n}\]

分别用\(\mathscr{C}\)左作用和右作用, 得

\[\sum_{i=1}^{t}k_{i}\mathscr{C}\mathscr{A}_{i}+\sum_{i=t}^{n-1}k_{i}\mathscr{C}\mathscr{A}_{i}=-k_{n}\mathscr{C}\mathscr{A}_{n}\]

\[\sum_{i=1}^{t}k_{i}\mathscr{A}_{i}\mathscr{C}+\sum_{i=t}^{n-1}k_{i}\mathscr{A}_{i}\mathscr{C}=-k_{n}\mathscr{A}_{n}\mathscr{C}\]

由于对\(t+1\leq i\leq n\), \(\mathscr{A}_{i}\mathscr{C}=-\mathscr{C}\mathscr{A}_{i}\). 故将两式相加, 得到

\[\sum_{i=1}^{t}k_{i}\mathscr{C}\mathscr{A}_{i}=0\]

而\(t\leq n-1\), 与\(n\)的最小性矛盾.

因此, \(M\)中不同且不互为相反数的元素线性无关. 而\(\dim M\leq n^{2}\). 故\(\left|M ight|\leq2n^{2}\). \(\square\)

问题 2 [Dedekind-Artin] 设\(G\)是一个幺半群, \(\mathbb{K}\)是一个域 (则\(K^{*} := \mathbb{K}-\{0\}\)是一个群). \(\sigma_{1},\sigma_{2},\ldots,\sigma_{n}\)是两两不同的非零同态\(G ightarrow K^{*}\), 则它们在\(\mathbb{K}\)上线性无关.

证明: 假设存在这样的一组非零同态, 使得它们在\(\mathbb{K}\)上线性无关, 则一定能找到其中元素个数最少的一组. 设\(n\)是满足

\[a_{1}\sigma_{1}+\cdots+a_{n}\sigma_{n}=0,\ a_{i}\in\mathbb{K} ext{不全为}0\]

的最小的正整数. 则\(n\geq2\), \(a_{i}\)均不为 0.

因为\(\sigma_{1},\sigma_{2}\)不同, 故\(\exists z\in G\)使得\(\sigma_{1}(z) eq\sigma_{2}(z)\). 对于任意\(x\in G\), 都有 \[a_{1}\sigma_{1}(xz)+\cdots+a_{n}\sigma_{n}(xz)=0\]

由于\(\sigma_{i}\)是同态, 则有

\[a_{1}\sigma_{1}(z)\sigma_{1}+\cdots+a_{n}\sigma_{n}(z)\sigma_{n}=0\]

两边同除\(\sigma_{1}\)并与第一个式子相减, 得

\[\left(a_{2}\dfrac{\sigma_{2}(z)}{\sigma_{1}(z)}-a_{2} ight)\sigma_{2}+\cdots+\left(a_{n}\dfrac{\sigma_{n}(z)}{\sigma_{1}(z)}-a_{n} ight)\sigma_{n}=0\]

其第一个系数就不为 0, 且比第一个式子少一个元素, 这与\(n\)的最小性矛盾.

因此, 任意一组两两不同的非零同态\(G ightarrow K^{*}\)在\(\mathbb{K}\)上线性无关. \(\square\)

问题 3 [Artin] 设\(\mathbb{E}\)为数域, \(G\)为\(\mathrm{Aut}\mathbb{E}\)的有限子群, 则\(\left|G ight|\geq\left[\mathbb{E}:\mathbb{F} ight]\).

证明: 设\(G=\{\sigma_{1}=\mathrm{id},\sigma_{2},\ldots,\sigma_{n}\}\). 要证\(\left[\mathbb{E}:\mathbb{F} ight]\leq\left|G ight|=n\), 只要证\(\mathbb{E}\)上任意\(n+1\)个元素在\(\mathbb{F}\)上线性相关.

\( orall\alpha_{1},\alpha_{2},\ldots,\alpha_{n},\alpha_{n+1}\in\mathbb{E}\), 则\(\mathbb{E}\)上的线性方程组

\[ egin{pmatrix}\sigma_{1}(\alpha_{1}) & \sigma_{1}(\alpha_{2}) & \cdots & \sigma_{1}(\alpha_{n+1})\\sigma_{2}(\alpha_{1}) & \sigma_{2}(\alpha_{2}) & \cdots & \sigma_{2}(\alpha_{n+1})\\vdots & \vdots & & \vdots\\sigma_{n}(\alpha_{1}) & \sigma_{n}(\alpha_{2}) & \cdots & \sigma_{1}(\alpha_{n+1})\end{pmatrix}_{n imes(n+1)} egin{pmatrix}x_{1}\x_{2}\\vdots\x_{n+1}\end{pmatrix}=0\]

必有非 0 解 (未知数的个数大于方程个数).

考虑其中包含非 0 元素最少的非零解\( egin{pmatrix}b_{1} & b_{2} & \cdots & b_{m} & 0 & \cdots & 0\end{pmatrix}\), 其中\(b_{i} eq0,i=1,2,\ldots,m\). 不妨设\(b_{1}=1\), (否则考虑\( egin{pmatrix}1 & \dfrac{b_{2}}{b_{1}} & \cdots & \dfrac{b_{m}}{b_{1}} & 0 & \cdots & 0\end{pmatrix}\)).

方程组两边用\(\sigma_{i}\)作用, 由\(\sigma_{i}\)是同态, 可以得到\( egin{pmatrix}\sigma_{i}(b_{1}) & \sigma_{i}(b_{2}) & \cdots & \sigma_{i}(b_{m}) & 0 & \cdots & 0\end{pmatrix}\)是一组非零解, 其中\(\sigma_{i}(b_{1})=\sigma_{i}(1)=1\). 将两组解相减, 得

\[ egin{pmatrix}0 & \sigma_{i}(b_{2})-b_{2} & \cdots & \sigma_{i}(b_{m})-b_{m} & 0 & \cdots & 0\end{pmatrix}\]

也是一组非零解. 但这组解比\( egin{pmatrix}b_{1} & b_{2} & \cdots & b_{m} & 0 & \cdots & 0\end{pmatrix}\)含有更少的非零元, 因此它只能是零解, 即

\[\sigma_{i}(b_{j})=b_{j},\ orall1\leq i\leq n,\ 1\leq j\leq m\]

由\(\mathbb{F}\)的定义知\(b_{j}\in\mathbb{F},\ orall1\leq j\leq m\). 所以

\[0=\sum_{j=1}^{n+1}\sigma_{1}(\alpha_{j})b_{j}=\sum_{j=1}^{n+1}\mathrm{id}(\alpha_{j})b_{j}=\sum_{j=1}^{n+1}b_{j}\alpha_{j}\]

这表明\(\alpha_{1},\ldots,\alpha_{n+1}\)在\(\mathbb{F}\)上线性相关. \(\square\)
